articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Wizards Of The Coast, ‘Apex Legends’ Under Fire For AI Art - Forbes
articles.description: Wizards of the Coast has doubled down on a Magic ad they say isn't AI, and Apex Legends appears to be AI filtering its characters.
articles.content:
Apex Legends
Respawn
The use of AI art across various mediums continues to accelerate, and now its made its way into two new controversies involving Wizards of the Coasts Magic: The Gathering and R… [+3547 chars]

articles.title: Astronomical Illusions: New Images Reveal What Neptune and Uranus Really Look Like - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Recent research led by Professor Patrick Irwin shows that Neptune and Uranus are both a similar shade of greenish-blue, challenging previous perceptions of their colors. The study used modern telescopic data to correct historical color inaccuracies and explai…
articles.content: A study reveals Neptune and Uranus are both greenish-blue, not the deep azure and pale cyan previously believed. Modern telescope data was used to correct these historical color misrepresentations. C… [+8848 chars]
